messages.subject: library
messages.msgSnippet: I took my boys (7 and 3) to the library today and remembered why I usually leave them with their dad when I go pick out books ROFL  Much too familiar except
messages.messageBody:
I took my boys (7 and 3) to the library today and remembered why I usually
leave them with their dad when I go pick out books>>

ROFL Much too familiar except my 8 yr only picks out movies, won't look at the
books (thanks to his first grade teacher >:/ ) and I have a 3yr and a 18 mo
old...so multiply your son times two...add high pitch screaming (they're girls)
when you pick them up, and climbing into chairs which promptly fall over with
the youngest in it. I can emphasize. Except with the hours my dh works I
rarely get a chance to visit the library alone. I just have to grin and bear
it. What saves me is keeping my eyes open for other parents in the same
predicament, so I know it's not just me or my kids. LOL

~Heather
